com.samsung.spensdk.applistener

Interface CustomHoverPointerSettingListener


  • public interface CustomHoverPointerSettingListener
    Listener interface related to S-Canvas view/layout for setting up custom hover pointers.
    Since:
    S-Pen SDK 2.2

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Drawable onHoverPointerDefault(Drawable defaultDrawable)
      Sets the custom hover pointer resource for default mode.
      Drawable onHoverPointerForFilling(SettingFillingInfo fillingInfo, Drawable defaultDrawable)
      Sets the custom hover pointer resource for fill mode.
      Drawable onHoverPointerForMove(Drawable defaultDrawable)
      Sets the custom hover pointer resource for moving mode.
      Drawable onHoverPointerForPicker(Drawable defaultDrawable)
      Sets the custom hover pointer resource for color picker mode.
      Drawable onHoverPointerForStroke(SettingStrokeInfo strokeInfo, Drawable defaultDrawable)
      Sets the custom hover pointer resource for writing input mode (pen or eraser).
      Drawable onHoverPointerForText(SettingTextInfo textInfo, Drawable defaultDrawable)
      Sets the custom hover pointer resource for text mode (pen or eraser).

    • Method Detail

      • onHoverPointerDefault

        Drawable onHoverPointerDefault(Drawable defaultDrawable)
        Sets the custom hover pointer resource for default mode.
        Parameters:
        defaultDrawable - Default Drawable for default mode
        Returns:
        Hover pointer resource for default mode to set
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.2

      • onHoverPointerForStroke

        Drawable onHoverPointerForStroke(SettingStrokeInfo strokeInfo,
                               Drawable defaultDrawable)
        Sets the custom hover pointer resource for writing input mode (pen or eraser).
        Parameters:
        strokeInfo - Writing input (pen or eraser) setting information
        defaultDrawable - Default Drawable for writing input mode resources
        Returns:
        Hover pointer resource for writing input mode to set
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.2

      • onHoverPointerForText

        Drawable onHoverPointerForText(SettingTextInfo textInfo,
                             Drawable defaultDrawable)
        Sets the custom hover pointer resource for text mode (pen or eraser).
        Parameters:
        textInfo - Text setting information
        defaultDrawable - Default Drawable for text mode
        Returns:
        Hover pointer resource for text mode to set
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.2
